meanings.definition: Stay away from school without permission.
meanings.sent1: Tom was truanting from school yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She truants often and gets in trouble.
meanings.sent3: The cat was truanting from its nap time.
meanings.sent4: The truanting clouds hid the sun from view.
meanings.sent5: Truanting in the park, the children played hooky from their studies.

meanings.definition: The act of skipping school without permission.
meanings.sent1: Truanting is not allowed in this school.
meanings.sent2: The principal addressed the issue of truanting.
meanings.sent3: The truanting of the students caused concern among the teachers.
meanings.sent4: Her record showed a history of truanting.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of truanting can be serious for students' education.
